featured.text: Though not a national holiday, Obon is surely one of the most traditional events of the year.

definition.zh_def: 盂蘭盆節，一個日本的傳統節日，用來紀念祖先的靈魂。
definition.en_def: Obon is a traditional Japanese festival that honors the spirits of one's ancestors.
definition.example: During Obon, families gather to celebrate and remember their deceased loved ones.
